Welcome: Welcome to the Trading App, if you want to see information about command type help
Help:
List of commands (first word a command, other are parameters): 
 addClient FirstName LastName PhoneNumber 
 addShare Name Cost 
 changeSharesToClient ClientID ShareID Amount 
 changeClientMoney ClientID MoneyAmount 
 showOrange 
 showBlack 
 showFullClients 
 showFullShares
